recommendations.low_model_confidence: Model confidence is low. Consider these general wellness suggestions:

high_confidence: You seem to present an undoubtedly healthy mental state. Continue your balanced lifestyle and prioritize good habits like sleep, nutrition, and regular wellness checks.
medium_confidence: You seem to have a healthy mental state. Keep maintaining your wellbeing through activities that bring you balance and calm.
low_confidence: Your mental state seems normal. Keep watching your emotional wellbeing and maintain habits like regular sleep, breaks, and social connections.

high_confidence: You show strong indicators of stress. Try practices like deep breathing, reducing caffeine, exercising, or speaking to someone you trust about what’s affecting you.
medium_confidence: You show moderate indicators of stress. Consider organizing your tasks, taking breaks, hydrating well, and practicing mindfulness techniques.
low_confidence: If you feel stressed, try limiting caffeine, taking short walks, or slowing down your pace. Small moments of rest can help significantly.

high_confidence: You show strong indicators of depression. It might help to consider reaching out to a mental health professional, trusted friend, or support line.
medium_confidence: There are indications of depressive feelings. Reflecting on your emotions, staying connected with others, and seeking support may help.
low_confidence: Even mild depressive thoughts can benefit from reflection and support. Try maintaining routines, engaging in hobbies, and talking with someone you trust.

high_confidence: You are not alone. If you are having thoughts of harming yourself, please contact your local suicide hotline immediately. If you are in immediate danger, call your local emergency number.
medium_confidence: Your text suggests you may be experiencing harmful thoughts. Please connect with a suicide hotline or professional support service right away.
low_confidence: Even if the indicators are low, if you have any self-harm thoughts, please consider contacting a professional or suicide prevention hotline.

anxiety: Additionally, your text shows indicators of anxiety. Consider breathing exercises, grounding techniques, or limiting stimulants like caffeine.

example_texts: I feel so empty inside. Nothing brings me joy anymore. I wake up each day wondering what's the point. I used to love painting but now I can't even pick up a brush. My friends invite me out but I just make excuses. I'm tired all the time but can't sleep properly. Everything feels gray and meaningless.

I have so much on my plate right now. Work deadlines are piling up, bills need to be paid, and I barely have time to breathe. I feel overwhelmed and like I'm drowning. My body feels tense all the time and I get headaches every day. I snap at people I care about because I'm so on edge.
I am happy and feeling good. Life is great. I had a good day today.
